title: Jessica Biel shows off endless legs with Justin Timberlake
title_page: Jessica Biel shows off endless legs with Justin Timberlake | Daily Mail Online
text:
They have been together for a decade and married for five years.
And Jessica Biel proved she is as loved up as ever with her husband Justin Timberlake as they headed out for a date after the Tribeca Film Festival event at the SVA theatre this evening in New York on Tuesday night.
The 35-year-old Total Recall star looked sensational in a stunning checked gown which showed off her endless legs while the Senorita singer, 36, went for a wholly casual ensemble as he wore a beanie and a shirt.
Scroll down for video
Legs eleven: Jessica Biel proved she is as loved up as ever with her husband Justin Timberlake as they headed out Tribeca Film Festival event at the SVA theatre this evening in New York on Tuesday night
Jessica looked phenomenal in the Self Portrait dress which made the most of her incredible figure complete with a perilous slash extending the length of her leg.
The chic gown was perfectly designed to make an impact with a frill running across her shoulders and down the plunging neckline.
Nipping in at her waist, the stunning star showed off her gym-honed frame perfectly while also nailing the red carpet to date night look.
Boosting her endless legs and height, the stunning star gave a nod to her superstar status in a pair of envy-inducing Christian Louboutin stilettos.
Stunner: The 35-year-old Total Recall star looked sensational in a stunning checked gown which showed off her endless legs while the Senorita singer, 36, went for a wholly casual ensemble as he wore a beanie and a shirt
Legs eleven: Jessica looked phenomenal in the dress which made the most of her incredible figure complete with a perilous slash extending the length of her leg
She scraped her brunette tresses into a high ponytail with the long lengths extending over her shoulder while her make-up was perfectly applied.
Jessica added a slick of pink lipstick yet kept the rest of her make-up minimal with just a slick of mascara to highlight her almond shaped eyes.
Justin meanwhile looked wholly more low-key than his stunning wife as he wore a beanie with a blazer and shirt buttoned up to the neck.
Earlier this year, loved-up Jessica discussed marriage to the star as he said: 'Literally every year weâ€™re married I'm looking for that thing that he really sucks at.'
Brunette beauty: She scraped her brunette tresses into a high ponytail with the long lengths extending over her shoulder while her make-up was perfectly applied
Low-key: Justin meanwhile looked wholly more low-key than his stunning wife as he wore a beanie with a blazer and shirt buttoned up to the neck
During her appearance on Ellen, the TV host decided to put a call in to Justin who was at home minding the couple's two-year-old son Silas. When he picked up the phone he told her he was busy making sweet potato fries for the toddler.
Ellen then informed him that according to the gossip mill, he and Jessica are expecting a second baby after he was photographed with his hands cradling her tummy as they danced at a recent LA Lakers game.
'I can't wait to find out whose it is,' he quipped right back.
